dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 116 IS: Celebrating the extraordinary accomplishments and vital role of women business owners in the United States.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Risch (for himself, Mr. Peters, Mr. Crapo, Ms. Rosen, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Kennedy, Mrs. Britt, Ms. Collins, Mr. Kelly, and Mr. Markey) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: Celebrating the extraordinary accomplishments and vital role of women business owners in the United States.

whereas.text: Whereas there are over 14,500,000 women-owned businesses in the United States; and

paragraph.text: employ more than 12,900,000 people in the United States;
have grown at nearly twice the national average; and
have grown from 4.6 percent to 39.2 percent of all businesses in the United States between 1972 and 2024: Now, therefore, be it
recognizes the vital role of women-owned businesses to the economy of the United States;
commends the exceptional entrepreneurial spirit of women business owners in the United States; and
celebrates women entrepreneurs in the United States.
